post.text:
Important to learn 'Rashtra Bhasha' Hindi,  Union minister Venkaiah Naidu says 

Read more: 
toi.in/fR8hcY

comments.text: Hindi is not national language. Why impose them in South? Do BJP wants India to be Hindia? We have accepted Urdu? Why not global English?
Hmm. Understand why US is a super power now. All they learn is English and not our rajastan badsha Hindhi (Pun included)
ನನಗೆ ಹಿಂದಿ ಚೆನ್ನಾಗೇ ಬರುತ್ತೆ. ಆದರೆ ನಾನು ಮೊದಲು ಹೆಮ್ಮೆಯ ಭಾರತೀಯ ಹಾಗು ಕನ್ನಡಿಗ. ನಮ್ಮದು ವೈವಿದ್ಯತೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಏಕತೆ ಸಾರುವ ದೇಶ.
More than 43 Cr speak Hindi as mother tongue and far more people understand Hindi than any language. Delhi follow 4 langauge formula.

@MVenkaiahNaidu
 sir have you ever won an election?
Can someone tell him hindi isn't the national language, only official language along with english
